plot: Handsome appearance and wealthy life gone in a car accident, Dongfang Xin also lost the ability to laugh and cry after surgery. He severed with his past life and decided to become a person ...
title: Destined
plot_es: Handsome appearance and wealthy life gone in a car accident, Dongfang Xin also lost the ability to laugh and cry after surgery. He severed with his past life and decided to become a person ...
